QuickPin for ChatGPT
Pin your important ChatGPT conversations for quick and easy access!

With QuickPin for ChatGPT, you can effortlessly pin your frequently used chats directly to the sidebar, making it easier than ever to navigate and manage your conversations. No more endless scrollingâ€”your key chats are just a click away!

Features:

Easy Pinning: Pin and unpin chats with a single click.
Quick Access: Access your important chats instantly from the sidebar.
Seamless Integration: Works seamlessly with ChatGPT's interface.
Organized Chats: Keep your most important conversations organized and at your fingertips.
Upgrade your ChatGPT experience with QuickPin and keep your important conversations right where you need them!
